title: How to study biology for iiserat if I have PCM? Should I also study grade 9& 10 biology - Quora
tags: Indian Institutes of Science Education and Research (IISERs)

response.answer_text: No, the bio is from 11th & 12th syllabi only. Try to stick to NCERT only. (Exemplar included). For typical MCQs, refer to NEET biology sessions on Vedantu. Stay happy and motivated 🤘
